titles.title: Protecting School Milk Choices Act of 2022
Protecting School Milk Choices Act of 2022
To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act with respect to the types of milk offered under the school lunch program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Protecting School Milk Choices Act of 2022
This bill revises requirements for milk provided by the National School Lunch Program of the Department of Agriculture.
Currently, schools participating in the program may provide lactose-free and flavored and unflavored milk. Under the bill, these schools must provide students flavored and unflavored milk and maintain the discretion to offer lactose-free milk.
